verses.roman:
bhikṣā kari' bakula-tale karilā viśrāma
pratāparudra-ṭhāñi rāya karila payāna

synonyms: bhikṣā kari'-after taking lunch; bakula-tale—underneath a bakula flower tree; karilā viśrāma—took rest; pratāparudra-ṭhāñi—to the presence of Mahārāja Pratāparudra; rāya—Rāmānanda Rāya; karila payāna—departed.
translation: While Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was taking rest beneath a bakula tree, Rāmānanda Rāya immediately went to Mahārāja Pratāparudra.
